name: Label that Diagram - Cells
description:
Label that Diagram - Cells  
This app provides the user the opportunity to study cell structure as well as test what they know. There are 5 cells presented: Animal Cell, Plant Cell, Amoeba, Paramecium and the Euglena.  The player can study the labeled diagram or play the game of labeling the diagram. The app was created with Clickteam Multimedia Fusion 2.5.

When the game is played, the labels appear in a random order one at a time and the player must tap on the correct dot on the diagram.  The player gets 50 pts for a correct answer, loses 25 points for a wrong answer and loses 100 points for revealing the answer with the Hint button. The app is FREE and does not ask for any permissions, no registration, and no advertising. No internet connection is needed to play. This app was tested on a variety of Android devices with no issue including smartphone, 7-inch tablet, 10-inch tablet, and an Android TV. It will probably work on an Android smart-board although it hasn't been tested. Send comments to rtcarman47@gmail.com
It should run fine on Android versions 5.0  and higher.
This app may be installed on multiple devices. It can be distributed to friends, colleagues, and students.  It is not to be sold or distributed for profit.
===== PRIVACY POLICY ======

by Richard Carman d.b.a. rtcgames - September - 2019
Privacy is considered as one of the fundamental human rights by many countries in the world. I also share this sentiment. Freeware produced by rtcgames does not acquire or ask for any information about the user or the device being used. These apps do not in any way, shape or form access the internet or any other communication system.
Rtcgames does not  collect or detect  the following user's data (or any data for that matter):  IP address, Full name, Email address, Location, Birthdate, Postal Address...
    or any other information that can be used to identify the individual using our apps.
